Name: Anvil F7A Hornet Mk I
Description:
Manufacturer: Anvil Aerospace
Focus: Medium Fighter

The UEE Navy's premier carrier-based fighter craft, the F7A Hornet Mk I is the front-line attack ship for military combat missions. While not outfitted for long range runs, the Hornet can take her share of hits and dish out a powerful response.
